name: 谢尔比·马龙
introduction: Born in Billings, Montana, Shelby Malone spent her first ten years living in Texas followed by Denver, Colorado. She has grown up with her mother, father, two brothers, and sister. Shelby graduated high school in 2008 and now lives in Los Angeles to pursue her acting career. She started acting when she was ten years old by performing in a series of plays with the Missoula Children's Theater. While Shelby has grown she's booked a number of commercials, plays, short films, and independent feature films. She also enjoys creating PSAs for the Special Olympics organization which have included her little brother Thomas. Shelby will be featured in a show on Fuel TV called Stupidface starting in January 2009. Also she has one of the lead roles in the up and coming independent film, Ink by Jamin Winans.
